item.title:
RT by @ralexstokes: We need to find better ways to have public conversations about Ethereum research and roadmap.
That requires more researcher & core dev engagement. But also better ways to surface high signal voices.
E.g. @fradamt is Ethereum's highest impact researcher, and has 2k followers.

item.title:
one aspect of north star discourse is that ethereum is an ambitious project, and if we execute, simply can “do it all”
it’s easy to be reactive to short-term desiderata so we have to double down on what’s possible in the long term as a vision to align around
think bigger.

that being said, any change to Ethereum should happen in dialogue with core developers/researchers who best understand the impacts of any given change
